translations: n.（舞蹈中的）跳跃；（马术中的）原地腾跃
v.（舞蹈中的）跳跃；（马术中的）原地腾越

phrs.translation: 跳跃, 原地腾跃, 活蹦乱跳, 跃起

sentences.sentence: The closest nevertheless a few months he is carrying long rainbow mobile phone to begin vivid capriole to come again.
sentences.translation: 不过最近几个月他又携着长虹手机开始活跃起来。
